execution_plan.description: Retrieve per-order, per-product item counts (quantity) from the Order_Items table. This gives, for each order_id and product_id, how many items of that product were ordered.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, product_id, COUNT(*) AS qty FROM Order_Items GROUP BY order_id, product_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product prices for the products referenced in step 1 so the application can compute cost = qty * product_price for each order-item.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
